name: Hero
desc: A widget that marks its child as being a candidate for [hero animations](https://docs.flutter.dev/ui/animations/hero-animations).

fields.name: tag
fields.desc: The identifier for this particular hero. If the tag of this hero matches the tag of a hero on a [PageRoute] that we're navigating to or from, then a hero animation will be triggered.

fields.name: createRectTween
fields.desc: Defines how the destination hero's bounds change as it flies from the starting route to the destination route.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget subtree that will "fly" from one route to another during a [Navigator] push or pop transition.

fields.name: flightShuttleBuilder
fields.desc: Optional override to supply a widget that's shown during the hero's flight.

fields.name: placeholderBuilder
fields.desc: Placeholder widget left in place as the Hero's [child] once the flight takes off.

fields.name: transitionOnUserGestures
fields.desc: Whether to perform the hero transition if the [PageRoute] transition was triggered by a user gesture, such as a back swipe on iOS.
